00020 class Eval {
00021  private:
00022   static bool read(std::istream *is,
00023                    std::vector<std::vector<std::string> > *r,
00024                    const std::vector<int> &level) {
00025     if (!*is) return false;
00026     char buf[BUF_SIZE];
00027     char *col[2];
00028     char *cvs[BUF_SIZE];
00029     r->clear();
00030     while (is->getline(buf, sizeof(buf))) {
00031       if (std::strcmp(buf, "EOS") == 0) break;
00032       CHECK_DIE(tokenize(buf, "\t", col,  2) == 2) << "format error";
00033       cvs[0] = col[0];
00034       size_t n = tokenizeCSV(col[1], cvs + 1, sizeof(cvs) - 1);
00035       std::vector<std::string> tmp;
00036       for (size_t i = 0; i < level.size(); ++i) {
00037         size_t m = level[i] < 0 ? n : level[i];
00038         CHECK_DIE(m <= n) << " out of range " << level[i];
00039         std::string output;
00040         for (size_t j = 0; j <= m; ++j) {
00041           output += cvs[j];
00042           if (j != 0) output += "\t";
00043         }
00044         tmp.push_back(output);
00045       }
00046       r->push_back(tmp);
00047     }
00048 
00049     return true;
00050   }
00051 
00052   static bool parseLevel(const char *level_str,
00053                          std::vector<int> *level) {
00054     char buf[BUF_SIZE];
00055     char *col[512];
00056     std::strncpy(buf, level_str, sizeof(buf));
00057     level->clear();
00058     size_t n = tokenize2(buf, "\t ", col, sizeof(col));
00059     for (size_t i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
00060       level->push_back(std::atoi(col[i]));
00061     }
00062     return true;
00063   }
00064 
00065   static void printeval(std::ostream *os, size_t c, size_t p, size_t r) {
00066     double pr = (p == 0) ? 0 : 100.0 * c/p;
00067     double re = (r == 0) ? 0 : 100.0 * c/r;
00068     double F = ((pr + re) == 0.0) ? 0 : 2 * pr * re /(pr + re);
00069     char buf[8192];
00070     sprintf(buf, "%4.4f(%d/%d) %4.4f(%d/%d) %4.4f\n",
00071             pr,
00072             static_cast<int>(c),
00073             static_cast<int>(p),
00074             re,
00075             static_cast<int>(c),
00076             static_cast<int>(r),
00077             F);
00078     *os << buf;
00079   }
00080 
00081  public:
00082   static bool eval(int argc, char **argv) {
00083     static const MeCab::Option long_options[] = {
00084       { "level",  'l',  "0 -1",    "STR",    "set level of evaluations" },
00085       { "output", 'o',  0,         "FILE",   "set the output file name" },
00086       { "version",  'v',  0,   0,    "show the version and exit"   },
00087       { "help",  'h',  0,   0,    "show this help and exit."   },
00088       { 0, 0, 0, 0 }
00089     };
00090 
00091     MeCab::Param param;
00092     param.open(argc, argv, long_options);
00093 
00094     if (!param.open(argc, argv, long_options)) {
00095       std::cout << param.what() << "\n\n" <<  COPYRIGHT
00096                 << "\ntry '--help' for more information." << std::endl;
00097       return -1;
00098     }
00099 
00100     if (!param.help_version()) return 0;
00101 
00102     const std::vector<std::string> &files = param.rest_args();
00103     if (files.size() < 2) {
00104       std::cout << "Usage: " <<
00105           param.program_name() << " output answer" << std::endl;
00106       return -1;
00107     }
00108 
00109     std::string output = param.get<std::string>("output");
00110     if (output.empty()) output = "-";
00111     MeCab::ostream_wrapper ofs(output.c_str());
00112     CHECK_DIE(*ofs) << "no such file or directory: " << output;
00113 
00114     const std::string system = files[0];
00115     const std::string answer = files[1];
00116 
00117     const std::string level_str = param.get<std::string>("level");
00118 
00119     std::ifstream ifs1(files[0].c_str());
00120     std::ifstream ifs2(files[1].c_str());
00121 
00122     CHECK_DIE(ifs1) << "no such file or directory: " << files[0].c_str();
00123     CHECK_DIE(ifs2) << "no such file or directory: " << files[0].c_str();
00124     CHECK_DIE(!level_str.empty()) << "level_str is NULL";
00125 
00126     std::vector<int> level;
00127     parseLevel(level_str.c_str(), &level);
00128     CHECK_DIE(level.size()) << "level_str is empty: " << level_str;
00129     std::vector<size_t> result_tbl(level.size());
00130     std::fill(result_tbl.begin(), result_tbl.end(), 0);
00131 
00132     size_t prec = 0;
00133     size_t recall = 0;
00134 
00135     std::vector<std::vector<std::string> > r1;
00136     std::vector<std::vector<std::string> > r2;
00137 
00138     while (true) {
00139       if (!read(&ifs1, &r1, level) || !read(&ifs2, &r2, level))
00140         break;
00141 
00142       size_t i1 = 0;
00143       size_t i2 = 0;
00144       size_t p1 = 0;
00145       size_t p2 = 0;
00146 
00147       while (i1 < r1.size() && i2 < r2.size()) {
00148         if (p1 == p2) {
00149           for (size_t i = 0; i < result_tbl.size(); ++i) {
00150             if (r1[i1][i] == r2[i2][i]) {
00151               result_tbl[i]++;
00152             }
00153           }
00154           p1 += r1[i1][0].size();
00155           p2 += r2[i2][0].size();
00156           ++i1;
00157           ++i2;
00158           ++prec;
00159           ++recall;
00160         } else if (p1 < p2) {
00161           p1 += r1[i1][0].size();
00162           ++i1;
00163           ++prec;
00164         } else {
00165           p2 += r2[i2][0].size();
00166           ++i2;
00167           ++recall;
00168         }
00169       }
00170 
00171       while (i1 < r1.size()) {
00172         ++prec;
00173         ++i1;
00174       }
00175 
00176       while (i2 < r2.size()) {
00177         ++recall;
00178         ++i2;
00179       }
00180     }
00181 
00182     *ofs <<  "              precision          recall         F"
00183          << std::endl;
00184     for (size_t i = 0; i < result_tbl.size(); ++i) {
00185       if (level[i] == -1) {
00186         *ofs << "LEVEL ALL: ";
00187       } else {
00188         *ofs << "LEVEL " << level[i] << ":    ";
00189       }
00190       printeval(&*ofs, result_tbl[i], prec, recall);
00191     }
00192 
00193     return true;
00194   }
00195 };

00197 class TestSentenceGenerator {
00198  public:
00199   static int run(int argc, char **argv) {
00200     static const MeCab::Option long_options[] = {
00201       { "output",   'o',  0,   "FILE", "set the output filename" },
00202       { "version",  'v',  0,   0,    "show the version and exit"   },
00203       { "help",  'h',  0,   0,    "show this help and exit."   },
00204       { 0, 0, 0, 0 }
00205     };
00206 
00207     MeCab::Param param;
00208     param.open(argc, argv, long_options);
00209 
00210     if (!param.open(argc, argv, long_options)) {
00211       std::cout << param.what() << "\n\n" <<  COPYRIGHT
00212                 << "\ntry '--help' for more information." << std::endl;
00213       return -1;
00214     }
00215 
00216     if (!param.help_version()) return 0;
00217 
00218     const std::vector<std::string> &tmp = param.rest_args();
00219     std::vector<std::string> files = tmp;
00220     if (files.empty())
00221       files.push_back("-");
00222 
00223     std::string output = param.get<std::string>("output");
00224     if (output.empty()) output = "-";
00225     MeCab::ostream_wrapper ofs(output.c_str());
00226     CHECK_DIE(*ofs) << "permission denied: " << output;
00227 
00228     char buf[BUF_SIZE];
00229     char *col[2];
00230     std::string str;
00231     for (size_t i = 0; i < files.size(); ++i) {
00232       MeCab::istream_wrapper ifs(files[i].c_str());
00233       CHECK_DIE(*ifs) << "no such file or directory: " << files[i];
00234       while (ifs->getline(buf, sizeof(buf))) {
00235         size_t n = tokenize(buf, "\t ", col, 2);
00236         CHECK_DIE(n <= 2) << "format error: " << buf;
00237         if (std::strcmp(col[0], "EOS") == 0 && !str.empty()) {
00238           *ofs << str << std::endl;
00239           str.clear();
00240         } else {
00241           str += col[0];
00242         }
00243       }
00244     }
00245 
00246     return 0;
00247   }
00248 };
00249 }

00251 // exports
00252 int mecab_system_eval(int argc, char **argv) {
00253   return MeCab::Eval::eval(argc, argv);
00254 }

00256 int mecab_test_gen(int argc, char **argv) {
00257   return MeCab::TestSentenceGenerator::run(argc, argv);
